alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Franklin; Madison; Sebastian; Washington (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Ice Storm Warning issued January 22 at 1:48AM CST until January 22 at 3:00PM CST by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...ICE STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM CST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Significant icing expected. Ice accumulation from a quarter to a half inch, in combination with sustained wind speeds from 15 to 20 mph with higher gusts. * WHERE...In Arkansas, Washington, Sebastian, Crawford, Franklin and Madison Counties. In Oklahoma, Adair and Sequoyah Counties. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to 3 PM CST Monday. * IMPACTS...The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. Scattered to numerous power outages may result from the combination of ice accumulation and wind.
info.instruction: Travel is strongly discouraged. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Prepare for possible power outages. In Arkansas, for the latest road conditions call 1-800-245- 1672 or go to idrivearkansas.com. In Oklahoma, for the latest road conditions call 1-844-465-4997 or go to okRoads.org.
